Water-Resistant Sunglasses: a. Develop a weather-tight seal, preventing water from entering the frame by redesigning the nose pads and temple ends with hydrophobic materials.
Multi-Functional Sunglasses: a. Introduce a built-in GPS, compass, or fitness tracker to support outdoor activities.
Eco-Friendly Sunglasses: a. Produce the frames from recycled plastic or sustainably sourced materials, minimizing the environmental impact.
Intelligent Sunglasses: a. Equip the sunglasses with sensors to detect UV exposure and automatically adjust lens tint to enhance glare reduction or provide UV protection.
Foldable Sunglasses: a. Add a lightweight, compact design that can be easily folded and stored in a pocket or bag.
